WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 12 SEP
   BY M/V RAMFORM TETHYS TOWING 12 6000
   METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-46.90S 039-24.56W, 21-46.74S 040-00.80W,
   22-06.17S 040-00.63W, 22-09.14S 040-00.05W,
   22-10.75S 040-00.07W, 22-11.69S 040-00.28W,
   22-12.25S 040-00.54W, 22-12.91S 040-00.98W,
   22-14.65S 040-01.00W, 22-14.81S 039-24.63W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 130001Z SEP 22.
